t: What are brand values?
Amazon launches new Amazon Saver private label to help shoppers save, take on Walmart, Target - ABC News
s: September 11, 2024 - On Wednesday, the retail tech giant, which owns Whole Foods as well as its own grocery service Amazon Fresh, announced expanded Prime member savings both in-store and online, the launch of a new private label brand, Amazon Saver, and enhancements to the online user experience.

t: Amazon: brand value 2024 | Statista
s: In 2024, Amazon's brand value reached 577 billion U.S. dollars.

t: About Us | About Amazon
s: Working to earn and keep our customers’ trust is the single biggest driver of Amazon’s Day 1 approach. Amazon’s decision-making process asks employees to consider whether an action is a one-way door—consequential and nearly irreversible—or a two-way door, easy to change course and go back.

t: Amazon reclaims title as USA’s most valuable brand, despite losing brand value | Press Release | Brand Finance
s: March 30, 2023 - View the full Brand Finance US 500 2023 report here  · Amazon has retaken top spot as the USA’s most valuable brand despite its brand value falling 15% this year from US$350.3 billion to US$299.3 billion. Amazon was previously the world’s most valuable brand from 2018 to 2020.

t: Prime Position: Amazon Named World’s Most Valuable Retail Brand | Press Release | Brand Finance
s: June 27, 2023 - Amazon has once again been named the world’s most valuable retail brand, with a brand value of US$299.3 billion, according to leading brand valuation consultancy, Brand Finance. This is more than double the brand value of Walmart (brand value up 2% to US$113.8 billion).

t: Amazon slips to third-most valuable brand
s: Last year Amazon was the world’s most valuable brand, now it’s third on the list. Apple and Google’s exceptionally strong year-on-year growth figures enabled them to leapfrog the retail, media and cloud services giant.
